alleyhunter.desc: Number of stacks to gain at the beginning. Default 0, maximum 10.

beaconofthereedsea.desc: 0 for damaged passive never triggered (default), 1 for triggered every time skill passive is triggered.

forestregalia.desc: Number of frames until the Leaf is picked up by the active character after every proc.

lostprayertothesacredwinds.ability: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
lostprayertothesacredwinds.desc: Number of stacks to gain at the beginning. Default 0, maximum 4.

moonpiercer.desc: Number of frames until the Leaf is picked up by the active character after every proc.

sacrificialbow.desc: 0 for not forcing the passive to trigger (default), 1 for forcing.

sacrificialfragments.desc: 0 for not forcing the passive to trigger (default), 1 for forcing.

sacrificialgreatsword.desc: 0 for not forcing the passive to trigger (default), 1 for forcing.

sacrificialsword.desc: 0 for not forcing the passive to trigger (default), 1 for forcing.

sapwoodblade.desc: Number of frames until the Leaf is picked up by the active character after every proc.

serpentspine.desc: Number of stacks to gain at the beginning. Default 0, maximum 5.

thealleyflash.desc: Lambda for Poisson distribution to periodically turn off the weapon passive.
